channel.title: Javac to java then i get another error
channel.description:
Okay ...
I got told to edit the Hybridspace Compiler, the line that said Javac. So i changed it from javac to java as told and .... New error. i cant find ne thing on the fourums a way to correct this and was wondering if ne one else knew how...
Error says
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ClientHandler/java Press any key to continue . . .
Please help.Thank you
Paul

item.title: Javac to java then i get another error
item.dc:creator: @Icedragons16 Icedragons16
item.description:
@Icedragons16 wrote:

right click compile, press edit

delete all of it… put this

@echo off COLOR 08 title Splashscape Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin/java.exe" server pause

Read full topic
item.source: Javac to java then i get another error
